sections.title: Witch (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Witch class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Witch)
sections.description: Witches are proficient with all simple weapons but not with armor or shields, as armor interferes with spellcasting by causing spells with somatic components to fail.

sections.title: Spells (Witch)
sections.description: Witches cast arcane spells from the witch spell list using Intelligence as their casting ability, requiring spell preparation through communion with their familiar for 1 hour after 8 hours of sleep.

sections.title: Hex (Witch)
sections.description: Witches learn magical tricks called hexes that grant powers or weaken foes, using them as standard actions with save DCs based on witch level and Intelligence modifier.

sections.title: Patron Spells (Witch)
sections.description: A witch must select a patron at 1st level that automatically grants additional spells known every two levels, with these spells also being stored in the familiar.

sections.title: Witch’s Familiar ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Witch)
sections.description: A witch bonds with a familiar that stores all her known spells and is required for daily spell preparation, functioning similarly to a wizard's arcane bond but with spell storage capabilities.

sections.title: Major Hex (Witch)
sections.description: Starting at 10th level and every two levels thereafter, a witch can select major hexes instead of regular hexes when gaining new hex abilities.

sections.title: Major Hexes (Witch)
sections.description: A collection of powerful hexes available to witches starting at 10th level, offering more potent magical abilities than regular hexes.

sections.title: Grand Hex (Witch)
sections.description: Starting at 18th level and every two levels thereafter, a witch can select grand hexes instead of regular hexes when gaining new hex abilities.

sections.title: Grand Hexes (Witch)
sections.description: The most powerful hexes available to witches starting at 18th level, representing the pinnacle of witch magical abilities.
